text: anyone else had a problem on the page editor where hitting “save” basically doesn’t do anything? Just had a client complain and I’m realizing that this button pretty much doesn’t work.
haven’t had that issue. your client knows they have to view the preview url if you hit save correct?
right, I get what you’re saying. Their issue is that hitting “save” doesn’t truly save it anywhere, like under revisions
so like they hit save after writing a bunch, then I could have it open at the same time and my auto-save could kill all of that
and neither of us has any idea what happened
There’s not a trail of conflicting saves, it’s just whatever was open last (I guess)
Do they have write permissions? The page editor UI doesn't tell you if you don't have write access
It will just quietly fail to save

Save never created a new revision. Revisions are only created on publish. We auto-save in the editors, so the save button is really unnecessary, but it stressed people out when we removed the save button. :slightly_smiling_face:

haha kinda reminds me of Google docs when it first came out they had a dummy save button - it litterally didn’t do anything but pop a modal that said “we auto save so you dont have to” it didn’t even trigger an actual save when you hit it, it did nothing
